PersonalBudgeting_BackendDocs
Table of Contents

Class UserRepository

Namespace
Model.Repositories
Assembly
Model.dll
Repository for handling User entities, implementing IUserRepository. Provides data access methods for retrieving, adding, updating, and deleting users, as well as related data such as incomes, expenses, and budgets.
public class UserRepository : GenericRepository<User>, IUserRepository, IRepository<User>
